Author: button_eyed_coraline
Text: I’m sorry you’re feeling this way. My instinct here is that you need to make your roommate whole for what you took. You can replace or repay, and let them know why it was you took what you took. Maybe the two of you could come up with a system of food storage that makes them feel safe that you won’t repeat the behavior as well as helps you to feel less inclined to take from them?   It is 100% not your fault that you have an ED, but you need to make this right because they don’t deserve to be stolen from either, you know? :/
